overview:
Hallum Motors has an established legacy of offering the highest quality pre-owned vehicles for your driving pleasure.

Hallum Motors has been in business for over 15 years. Hallum Motors sell mostly local, one owner vehicles. Hallum Motors very rarely buys cars at auction. We have an outstanding reputation in the community for selling great vehicles and standing behind them

Kent Hallum is the owner.

Kent Hallum Also owns Crittenden EMS A transport emergency service (ambulatory)

Kent Hallum Of Hallum Motors also Owns Mid Delta planting company an agricultural farming company (Soy Beans & Rice)
